data.oai_dc:dc: Weekly MODIS Aqua NDVI at 2.5 arc-minutes

Raster brick of weekly average NDVI from NASA's Aqua satellite and MODIS sensor (a total of 143 weeks between Jan 5, 2014 and Oct 1, 2016), in GRI format, at a resolution of 2.5 arc-minutes. Layer names indicate the date each week starts on. For example, the layer named ndvi_modis_aqua_wk151025 has average NDVI for the week starting on October 25, 2015.
